summary: A restaurant owner falls in love with an opera singer and, desperate to impress her, travels to Italy to learn how to sing.
cast: Rodney Dangerfield|Anita De Simone|Annabelle Gurwitch|Charles Fleischer|Robert Davi|Hamilton Camp|Elsa Raven|Jacob Urrutia|Richard Libertini|Dom Irrera|Patrick Cupo|Anney Giobbe|Vincent Schiavelli|Pierrino Mascarino|Marty Belafsky|Don Stark|Lisa Mende|Carmen Filpi|Roger Behr|Don Calfa|Benito Prezia|Rae Allen|Vasili Bogazianos|Mario Davis|Fausto Callegarini|Elin Carlson|Carrie Freeman|Ric Mancini|Argentina Brunetti|Joe Nipote|Joseph Vassallo|Bianca Rossini|Shana Hiatt|Yosi Oved|Joe Bucaro III|Morgan Reese|Joseph Della Sorte|Granville Ames|Marcos Sola|Dina Torok|Phil Culotta|Frank Torres|Mark De Alessandro|Jefferson Wagner|Gregory J. Barnett|Dennis Madalone|Jenna Hagel|Ray Huffman
title: The 4th Tenor
